Eretia.name: Eretia
Eretia.townDescription: The beginning of the silk road, from the hatcheries of the Moon Spiders, straight to the docks.
Eretia.marketDescription: Weaver matrons click and chitters as bolts of cloth shimmer in the winds to passers by.
Eretia.hazardDescription: The cobwebs along the woods tighten to sticky webs across the road. Hunters attack!
